nodes.text: KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 1: The Sandcrawler

KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 1: The Sandcrawler is an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on August 19, 2008 and is a first in the series of web enhancements, which present material that didn't made it into Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide because of space reasons. This article covers the sandcrawler from Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.
